uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo
Class VerifyMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo.AbstractFitNesseMojo
          uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo.RunTestsMojo
              uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo.VerifyMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo, SurefireReportParameters
public class VerifyMojo
extends RunTestsMojo

Goal that provides summary report on FitNesse tests run with 'run-tests' goal. Intended to be bound to the 'verify' phase. Will fail the build if there are test failures.

Is defined by the goal name:
verify
Is bound to the specified phase of the standard build lifecycle:
verify
